column1: This is what student debt really looks like: 60-year-olds getting paychecks garnished. Seniors losing Social Security. Workers laid off or without degrees having no hope of it paying off. Extending the moratorium isn’t enough. We must #CancelStudentDebt. https://t.co/IIyfX73rk2

Today we celebrate the many contributions of Native communities to a country that took so much and we honor the pride and determination of people who deserve our respect. Especially during this pandemic our government must address its broken promises and empower Native Nations.

260000 families have an empty seat at the dinner table this Thanksgiving. Hundreds of thousands more are battling this virus today. Let’s hold them in our hearts and stay in the fight for stronger healthier and happier days ahead.

And this Thanksgiving I want to thank all of you who have done your part to help stop this virus who have helped a friend or neighbor in need and who have fought to make this government work for everyone not just the rich and powerful. I’m grateful to fight alongside you.
I want to thank our servicemembers and military families for the sacrifices they make for our country. We owe it to them to protect their health and well-being on Thanksgiving and every day.

I want to give special thanks this Thanksgiving to our essential workers – grocery food service warehouse and farm workers – who risk their health to keep us fed. They deserve more than thanks – they deserve premium pay safety protections paid leave and health care security.

Thanksgiving is a day to celebrate the kindness and generosity of others and to count our many blessings. Today I want to give special thanks to our doctors nurses scientists and public health experts who are fighting around the clock to stop this pandemic and keep us safe.

8. Biden-Harris can issue the strongest ethics and anti-corruption standards for executive branch personnel ever to padlock the revolving door between jobs in government and industry reduce the influence of lobbyists and eliminate conflicts of interest.
7. Biden-Harris can restore balance and competition by prioritizing strong anti-monopoly protections and enforcement.

5. Biden-Harris can build on their commitment to establish a Racial and Ethnic Disparities Task Force by collecting and reporting COVID-19 data and reviewing racial disparities in pandemic funding.
4. Biden-Harris can raise the minimum wage for all federal contractors to $15 an hour.

3. Biden-Harris can issue enforceable OSHA health and safety standards for COVID-19 – so giant companies don't escape accountability for workplace conditions that expose workers to serious harm and even death.

2. Biden-Harris can lower drug prices for millions by producing key drugs like insulin naloxone hepatitis C drugs and EpiPens at low costs using the federal government's existing authority to bypass patents for pressing public health needs.

1. Biden-Harris can cancel billions of dollars in student loan debt giving tens of millions of Americans an immediate financial boost and helping to close the racial wealth gap. This is the single most effective executive action available for a massive economic stimulus.
